channel.title: Skarred Lands
channel.description:
[center][img]http://skarred-lands.net/Themes/zone99_20/images/custom/logo.png[/img] [size=8pt]Credits to [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=550286]Coldmedicine[/url] for the logo.[/size][/center]
[anchor=about] [size=14pt]Table of Contents[/size][/anchor]
[ol][li][iurl=#about]About Skarred[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#updates]Update Log[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#media]Media[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#support]Support List[/iurl][/li][/ol]
[anchor=about] [size=18pt]About Skarred[/size][/anchor] Skarred-Lands is a server that I consider as 'mine'. However, I did not create the base for the source. It's base is a PI server. The client is a refactored/renamed 317 client that is loading higher content, such as: 602 items, ~562 gameframe, and 474 or 508 maps... I have personally put in a lot of work to this base, regarding writing skills and new content. I have not finished re-writing all skills, as I keep going back and re-writing a skill I wrote earlier. I've decided to go with a concept of loading skill data (Ex: mining rocks, or exp/anims/log ids for firemaking) from JSON because of how fast and flexible JSON is with GSON. And finally, I plan to make Skarred-Lands into [u]my[/u] version of RuneScape; [u]Not yours.[/u]
[anchor=updates] [size=18pt]Update Log[/size][/anchor] I have been slacking on my log in the last few weeks, so a lot of it is based on memory. I do use github for my project, and it is on a private repo, but the naming for the greater portion of my recent commits do not represent what they actually did. I do not do daily commits and I also like to take breaks. Do not expect a daily log.
[code=New Updates] Partial shop cleanup (part one of many) Rewrote thieving (again) Rewrote herblore (again) Added Clan chat password system. Fixed infinite shop item bug Rewrote the tutorial for new players. Added Runescape-like game filter (Client + server) Added boot smithing to smithing interface. Requires 1 bar + leather boots. Rewrote smithing interface code. Used color packets instead of @red@ Converted playersaving to json Converted any external data to json (npc drops, spawns, etc etc etc) Updated client to allow players to register on the forums Updated server to register new players on the forums And a bunch of shit I forgot. [/code] [spoiler=Old Updates][code=Old Updates]Server -
Added mithril grapple making Rewrote achievement handler for easier (more efficient) achievements Added support for godwars objects Grappling to/from arma encampment Swimming to/from zammy encampment The full (Was missing 1 part) path to the saradomin encampment Prayer/Teleport on god altars in each chamber. ----- Cleaned up ::players command and added crowns for client update. Re-Enabled the GWD teleport. Fixed godwars chamber clipping Fixed possibility of fishing a dead spot. Fixed mining objects ghost spawning in mysterious caves. Fixed jewelry interface coming up when any item used on furnace. Disabled double XP ----- Lowered Abyssal Whip bonuses Increased Chaotics bonuses Removed prayer bonus from bolts Wrote new gate and double door editor. Added gates between lumbridge and varrock. Fixed initiate armour not going to the correct equip slot Fixed slayer task nullpointer Fixed clan chat nullpointer Added support for packet 218 (Report player) Added support for mod-muting using the report player interface Added support for "offline" muting and banning. Added support for fight caves wave interface. Lowered tokens on floor 3 of dungeoneering. Removed "Apply now" from staff interface. Fixed double death by npc server point gain. Enabled Double XP for the weekend ----- Replaced NPCs in Mysterious caves. Added rocktail and cavefish support for fishing & cooking Added new fishing spawns in Mysterious caves. Added support for fishing spots to "Die". They don't move though. Spawn timers are random. Added new shop at home "Grummy's Goods" Removed all but home teleport tab from general store, and added the tab to make teleports in place. Made weapons in Weapon Roulette a lot more random than before. You'll never guess what weapon comes next.. Fixed leather crafting not crafting the item displayed. Fixed firemaking, now has ashes, walking back, global objects, etc.. Fixed leather crafting not removing all leathers. Updated some boss npc's stats (I might have forgot which ones...) ----- Fixed slayer tasks not updating per kill Fixed issue causing slayer task to not reset properly. Fixed any possible issue with warriors guild stairs taking up/down. Fixed trade being able to be done in wildy (sometimes) Rewrote Teleport Tab code Added teleport tab making (a little different than runescape) Boosted crafting exp. Added skilling tasks (More tasks to come) ---- Added impling jar looting - Used impling data from runescape Made implings actually get captured when you catch them (aka removed from world) Added support for eating Cakes, Pies, and Pizzas. Eating a full pie will leave a pie dish. Made pest control doors work like doors. Updated floor 1 dungeoneering npcs. Modified exp for Hunter (lower) Added Kingly Impling and Zombie impling Fixed server cycle time Fixed hexhunter rarity ----- Fixed Pure Ess mining in some locations. Edited Crystal Chest messages to be more dynamic towards the players inventory (As if it matters) Rewrote RFD minigame, fixing it being inaccessible. Also rewrote the RFD minigame shop handler. Tweaked the teleport from my zone. Similar to RFD, rewrote 90% or so of the code to Fight Caves. Fixed Fight Caves (jad minigame) not starting. Fixed Tz-Kih prayer draining ability Added entrance message to Fight Caves Fixed npcs not spawning out of view, or not doing anything when barley in view Removed EventManager instances in NPCHandler. ---- Crafting - Totally redone.. Tanning, Gem cutting, Jewelry making all work (rings, amulets, gems, even furys) Fletching - Support for making bolts and adding tips. No method for enchanting atm. Woodcutting - Fixed magic tree, added some missing trees, Fixed multi-cut. Mining - Added granite & sandstone, added some missing ids. Lumbridge - Added support for the broken fence in the cemetery Al Kharid - Made shanty pass work Wrote my own server sided vote checker as GTL's stopped working. Fixed kicking players using the server console, it now does a more forceful kick. Fixed ::Tele command for owners (me, lol) Added new object handling to make objects spawn with their original rotation. Created a new gate handling system. I still have some kinks to work out and about 1000 gates to add. bare with me. Updated Dragon impling prices. Added closing to gate handler. Fixed admin/owner bank command. Finished Lumbridge-Drayor gates. Runecrafting - Fixed issue where it would give multiple runes off by 1. Added moulds to the skill shop (no where else to put em). ---- Fixed empty glasses popping up in inventory. Fixed gold and silver smelting options. Fixed Weapon Roulette smuggle Fixed possible npc error when new npcs spawn Fixed slayer reqs for banshees Fixed bug causing rune altars not giving multiple runes. Fixed bronze bar requirements Tweaked Woodcutting exp Added rejoining clans on login. Added support for new "bury all" option on bones Added support for the new "smelt all" in replace of smelt X. Updated slayer shop prices. Lowered amount of rune essense in Skilling shop Changed magic shop. Aubury is now in charge of it. Added support for aubury's three chat options (talk, teleport, trade). Talking opens a prompt asking if you want to do option 2 or 3. Teleport takes you to the essense mines (teleport to be configured..), and trade opens the shop. Fixed runecrafting altars and Mausoleum. Sizes were off by 1. Fixed slayer - wasn't assigning tasks. Finished Weapon Roulette dialogues. Added support for new clan chat icons. Added support for pure essense mining at the essense mines. Converted clan saving from .ini to .json. Added support for the portals in the essense mines (They all take you back to Aubury). Fixed a bug causing extra messages to print out (to console) Fixed item on object packet error (thanks to xX4m4zingXx for pointing out the issue :) ) Fixed Weapon Roulette lobby not registering a player teleported. Fixed issue causing server points not to save (sometimes) Removed PK points & Slayer points and replaced with server points
Client -
Changed achievement text to buttons Fixed tab to reply Fixed bank not scrolling with mousewheel ----- Added crown support for players online. Fixed godwars. ----- Fixed Moderator mute option on report interface Renamed some rules on report interface Fixed possible packet error when reporting. Fixed rule #13 not being able to be clicked. Added Fight Caves wave interface. Enabled the idle timer packet, changed it's time from 1 minute to approx. 10. ----- Fixed client zoom bug Fixed zooming in when interfaces open ---- Fixed a bug where if the client couldn't load (Also being investigated) you couldn't close the client. Added new "bury all" option for all bones. Replaced "Smelt X" with "Smelt All" Added clan chat icons (YAY) Added support for crowns on interfaces (This was a fudgeing runt and a half). Updated clan chat interface to use crowns I removed the little into screen, now you can login as soon as the client is loaded. I also fixed a bug causing the run orb not to work properly. Other minor updates were done but aren't important.[/code][/spoiler]
[anchor=media] [size=18pt]Media[/size][/anchor] [b]Warning: There might be a lot of media. The recording software I use sometimes makes the colors render incorrectly. Usually it's shades of green that get turned gray. The media is also in order by the image name. Sorry not sorry.[/b] [spoiler=Regular Media] Bury All option: (Credits to Arham for the idea) [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/buryAll.png[/img] Exp from burying all: [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/buryAll2.png[/img] Clan chat icons: [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/clanchat1.jpg[/img] Admins/Owners get Admin rank in any clan chat: [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/clanchat2.jpg[/img] Curses (Not very special): [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/curses.jpg[/img] Yell has a custom tab + customizable yell titles: [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/customYell.jpg[/img] My own dungeoneering: [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/dungeoneeringgame.jpg[/img] Dungeoneering entrance: [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/dungeoneeringportal.jpg[/img] Facebook smilies in yell: [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/facebooksmilies.jpg[/img] Fletching Items: [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/home.jpg[/img] If your account is linked to the forums, you get forum login messages: [img]http://skarred-lands.net/randmedia/LoginMessages.png[/img] Our [anchor=support] [size=18pt]Support List[/size][/anchor] Should I do one of these or are they dumb?

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

As stated here, I’ve decided to join the EdgevillePK development team.

This will bring some questions up for a few of my ‘followers’ I’m sure, so I’ll try to answer what I assume would be asked, here:
I do not plan on releasing the source code for my server/client now that I’ve joined a team. I’ve put too much time into this to just let it like that.
I do want to continue this. I cannot say what the future holds, but I don’t want to end the source so… half-finished. Hopefully, I’ll be able to work on it along side working with the dev team, but it sadly isn’t a priority.

The worst case scenario is: EdgevillePK becomes popular and I have 0 time to manage this. That would simply just mean there would be no development if/until EdgevillePK was “finished” (Interpret that how you will). It doesn’t mean it’s over.

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Added some server > Client packets to my server:
8,
142,
166,
176,
177,
215.

The only packets that need to be added are:
60,- weird varsize packet
64,- Something with items
105,- Sound packet of some form
147- Does something with objects

[hr]
Did some more work today.

Nothing major; but noting it as to show I’m still progressing (even if it’s slow).

Started Diner for P.O.H.
Fixed bug when removing curtains in P.O.H.
Fixed deleting objects in P.O.H (Some objects would not delete, some deleted EXTRA objects :P).
Fixed lottery sending message even if player had filter on.

I need to rewrite the deleting room code… But in order to do that I also have to rewrite my interference code… (Basically, checking if there is a room in front of you or not).
Believe it or not that little bit takes a good hunk of code as I have to check all directions near the door AND player, as the door they clicked might have been the one from the room they were trying to delete.

[hr]
Added more server > client packets:

64// Clears tiles in 8x8 square of items/objects to their normal state
147// Player to object
105// Plays sound at coords ? (Cannot test as music doesn’t work)

Only packet missing now is packet 60.
I’m having a hard time understanding it as it seems to be like packet 85 mixed with other packets…

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:212, topic:549435”]Sorry, no real updates atm.

[quote]Hey guys, sorry I haven’t posted any updates recently.

I’ve been busy working with a client, and some other stuff. I’m going to be incapacitated tomorrow, and probably not want to do shit the next few days, as I have a dentists appointment.

No gifs or anything as this is an announcement post, not an update, but here’s a couple things I’ve done:

  • Added room deletion (Need to fix rug deletion).
  • Fixed object deletion when rooms are re-built (Before it would show empty objects where the room objects would normally be, until you placed the room)
  • Added garden objects to the building interfaces.
    [/quote]

New updates 10/27/2015:

[quote]Today I’ve decided to add in another method of travel, per-say.

Instead of using the gatestone for dungeoneering, I’ve decided to use it globally - that means all around the map.
How it works is simple:
Purchase a gatestone from the Etheral Guide (Near the dungeon portal).
Go to whatever location.
Drop the gatestone.
Teleport back to it at anytime by using the command ::ggs.
Your gatestone will be returned to your inventory as you teleport.

Note: I will be updating the gatestone to have the drop action first.
Note 2: While “Global” - there are still restrictions as to where it can be placed. Ex: You can place it in godwars, but not in any god chamber.

I have also finished up the kitchen for Player Owned Houses.[/quote][/quote]Neat concept!

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Coldmedicine:

Freebump

Thanks.

[hr]
Small updates still. Still bitching at Experian… All their phone options for customer support send me to the website. The website sends me to either A) The phone (AGAIN) or B) Email. I attempted to contact them via email, and they say to contact em over the phone. Every time I call them, the line goes dead when it’s supposed to transfer me to a person… I tried telling them this in an email, but their response is “Some matters can only be handled through the phone due to bla bla”. AKA, they won’t help.

Updates:

Moved site to new domain(.net instead of .com) due to the domain host charging $50 to renew. It was cheaper to just get a new one and go through my webhost (They charge like $10 annually) Updated any/all references to the site within the server (And other parts of the site) to the new domain. Rewrote the Recipe for Disaster minigame - This code has been irking me for some time. Rewrote the Lottery game - Now the lottery saves when: Server closes, a player wins the lotto, a player enters, a player claims their unclaimed prize. It saves unclaimed prize data and current participants (By playername). Misc. code cleanup

Read full topic

mrbad23:

anything new?

Been busy dealing with one problem after another… Haven’t really concentrated on any project.

Some of the shit I’ve been dealing with:
My identity was leaked online says Experian (The credit people…).
I attempt to sign up to the complementary privacy protection due to it being “their fault” the servers were hacked and my info leaked, but they say they have no information on me (WHUT??),
Days later: Amazon says they’re worried my information was posted online, and that they (amazon) changed my password for security reasons.

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Sorry, no real updates atm.

Hey guys, sorry I haven't posted any updates recently.

I’ve been busy working with a client, and some other stuff. I’m going to be incapacitated tomorrow, and probably not want to do shit the next few days, as I have a dentists appointment.

No gifs or anything as this is an announcement post, not an update, but here’s a couple things I’ve done:

  • Added room deletion (Need to fix rug deletion).
  • Fixed object deletion when rooms are re-built (Before it would show empty objects where the room objects would normally be, until you placed the room)
  • Added garden objects to the building interfaces.

New updates 10/27/2015:

Today I've decided to add in another method of travel, per-say.

Instead of using the gatestone for dungeoneering, I’ve decided to use it globally - that means all around the map.
How it works is simple:
Purchase a gatestone from the Etheral Guide (Near the dungeon portal).
Go to whatever location.
Drop the gatestone.
Teleport back to it at anytime by using the command ::ggs.
Your gatestone will be returned to your inventory as you teleport.

Note: I will be updating the gatestone to have the drop action first.
Note 2: While “Global” - there are still restrictions as to where it can be placed. Ex: You can place it in godwars, but not in any god chamber.

I have also finished up the kitchen for Player Owned Houses.

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

Looks really impressive to me, man. Keep it up.

I had an idea to implement a jackpot system CSGO scene is so hyped about nowadays into an RSPS. People put in-game items into one collector (a chest for example), a timer starts to countdown, when max item amount has been put into the chest or time runs out the winner is drawn, the more value one player puts into the chest, the more chances (%) he has to win the jackpot. You might want to check it out yourself if you didn’t understand me, but it would be a pretty cool addition to a server with good player base.

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Don’t worry guys, I’m still working on it!

Here’s me building some furniture in the POH:

Edit:

While finishing up the parlor room, I had encountered a couple height mapping issues which I didn't get earlier. I made sure that there should no longer be any problems when you attempt to build on height levels above 'normal' (above 3). I also had to play around with the curtains as they didn't want to display properly when I first started.

I wanted to make the gif a higher quality… But GIFCam wouldn’t allow me to set the max memory about 2.147m (They stored it in an int ) kb. Due to this, the program crapped out during saving… I actually had to record the above one twice as the first cut was too big.
There’s about 1100 frames in the current gif, btw.

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @Loading_please_wait1 Loading please wait
item.description:
@Loading_please_wait1 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:203, topic:549435”][quote author=bandos beast link=topic=668337.msg4495342#msg4495342 date=1441757914]
dead? or no?
[/quote]
Nope. There haven’t been any recent posts because I can’t post twice

I don’t really want to release lots of information about the “grand scheme” of what I’m working on.
But I’ll give you guys some teasers/etc.

In my last post, I showed off the construct map region packet. Well, I’ve been working on Player Owned Houses recently. Of course I’m sure this brings up a lot of questions, the biggest of them being “why”. Well, I can’t say too much why right now. One of the major reasons why, is because this is a new “feat” for me, as player owned houses is probably the most complex thing I’ve added to a server.

As most of you are aware, the 317/377 cache does not have the interfaces for construction. That’s because construction wasn’t added until revision 474 (sooner? later?). Because of this, I actually had to go and make my own.
I still have to finish up the furniture interface (about 80% done), but here’s the room selection interface I made:

(As you can see, I have a thing for saying BETA apparently)
The items on the interface are not the “final” ones. As they were sent using a command that uses a default zoom, when it’s finished they’ll be more clear.

A quick little show off on POH’s:

spjFfyI.gif764×496

Before someone says it: I already know the doors are going the wrong way.
(I also had to add the “There’s no place like home” interface :P)[/quote]

Looking good. How is construction coming along? Have you been able to work on it any more since your last post?

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

bandos beast:

dead? or no?

Nope. There haven’t been any recent posts because I can’t post twice

I don’t really want to release lots of information about the “grand scheme” of what I’m working on.
But I’ll give you guys some teasers/etc.

In my last post, I showed off the construct map region packet. Well, I’ve been working on Player Owned Houses recently. Of course I’m sure this brings up a lot of questions, the biggest of them being “why”. Well, I can’t say too much why right now. One of the major reasons why, is because this is a new “feat” for me, as player owned houses is probably the most complex thing I’ve added to a server.

As most of you are aware, the 317/377 cache does not have the interfaces for construction. That’s because construction wasn’t added until revision 474 (sooner? later?). Because of this, I actually had to go and make my own.
I still have to finish up the furniture interface (about 80% done), but here’s the room selection interface I made:

(As you can see, I have a thing for saying BETA apparently)
The items on the interface are not the “final” ones. As they were sent using a command that uses a default zoom, when it’s finished they’ll be more clear.

A quick little show off on POH’s:

Before someone says it: I already know the doors are going the wrong way.

dead? or no?

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

As arham quoted. There is no “expected” release date. The reason for that is because I’m going at my own pace and taking plenty of breaks and free time. Doing so will “prevent” me from being totally burnt out on my RSPS.

That being said, I’m still working plenty on it.

With a bit of help from lare, I got the construct map region packet working.
Here’s a fun little gif showing that off:

Note: I said slayer tower but should have said fenkenstrain’s castle.

If you don’t get how I’m using the packet:
I sent the data for the Canifis region in the construct map region packet. After that it was just a matter of running to the end of the region to make it load the next chunk, therefore causing the map data I originally sent to be replaced by what actually exists in the region.

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred Lands
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“beale, post:199, topic:549435”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=668337.msg4494299#msg4494299 date=1440544166]
Thanks to whatever mod reset the edit timer on my topic, I updated the OP a little bit. All I did was re-organize the media and throw the latest images into the section.

Still looking for someone to help with my dungeoneering interface.

Also, other news: My new skill system is working rather well. The conversion process is going to take a bit though. But in the end it will be easier to use.
[/quote]

Is this server going to be released to the public, or is it just for fun and learning purposes? I would definitely love to play if it was released, I know that a lot of work has been put into it.[/quote]

sk8rdude461:

Nope, there’s no planned release date for the server. If I find the content is good enough (by my standards), and I feel the server is complete enough, I will host it again. However, I have no idea if/when that will happen.

Read full topic
